thread.title: Stock Market Set for Worst Quarter Since 2011
thread.title_full: Stock Market Set for Worst Quarter Since 2011

title: Stock Market Set for Worst Quarter Since 2011
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
2 Oct 2015 05:46 AM EST 
U.S. stocks rose on Wednesday as investors picked up beaten-down stocks, but all three major indexes were on track for their worst quarter since 2011. For most of the third quarter, global markets were rocked by fears of slowing growth in China. Adding to the uncertainty, the U.S. Federal Reserve held off on raising interest rates at its September meeting. Investors will be keen to put the bruising quarter behind them and look ahead to the third-quarter earnings season, which begins next week. Data on Wednesday showed that the U.S. private sector added more jobs than expected in September, raising hopes of a strong reading in the government's payrolls report due Friday.
